name: Thanatologist
otherNightReminder: If the player marked **KNOW** died today or tonight, point to the new player marked **KNOW**.
ability: You start knowing a player. Each night*, if they died today or tonight, learn their character type and know a new player.

name: Cloudchaser
firstNightReminder: Choose info to give the Cloudchaser and give the signal for it.
ability: You start knowing info. Each day, you may choose to learn 1 word relating to it or learn new info.

name: Director
ability: You start knowing 2 players, at least 1 of which is good. Each night*, if any are dead, know new players.

name: Jester
ability: You start knowing the Demon token. Demons & Minions learn false info & characters. When you die, or each night* you may, inform them of their characters.

name: Pioneer
ability: Each night, learn a completely fresh character.
firstNightReminder: Show the  a character token you have never shown any player.
otherNightReminder: Show the  a character token you have never shown any player.

name: Hierophant
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn 2 players, 1 they should consider & 1 they should not.
firstNightReminder: The Hierophant chooses a player. Point to 2 players once they have done so.
otherNightReminder: The Hierophant chooses a player. Point to 2 players once they have done so.

name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): if they are good, learn a non-Demon, else learn an arbitrary player.
firstNightReminder: The Matchmaker chooses a player. Point to a player.
otherNightReminder: The Matchmaker chooses a player. Point to a player.

name: Ahimsaka
ability: Each night, you may choose 2 players (not yourself): while you have chosen equal good & evil players, they are safe from evil.
firstNightReminder: The Ahimsaka might choose 2 players. If they do, mark them as **CHOSEN**.
otherNightReminder: The Ahimsaka might choose 2 players. If they do, mark them as **CHOSEN**.

name: Rogue
ability: Each night, you learn & gain an in-play ability until dusk. Players with an ability you have are drunk (if you choose them, you are instead).
firstNightReminder: Show the Rogue a character token. Until dusk, treat them as though they have the ability. Mark the other players with that ability as **DRUNK**
otherNightReminder: Show the Rogue a character token. Until dusk, treat them as though they have the ability. Mark the other players with that ability as **DRUNK**

name: Convive
firstNightReminder: The Convive points at a player. Indicate the direction of that player's closest Outsider from that player. If that player is the Drunk, additionally show the Drunk token and remove the 'is the Drunk' reminder token from them.
otherNightReminder: The Convive points at a player. Indicate the direction of that player's closest Outsider from that player. If that player is the Drunk, additionally show the Drunk token and remove the 'is the Drunk' reminder token from them.
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn the direction of their closest Outsider. If they are the Drunk, learn this & they get true info, even if dead. [+the Drunk]

name: Ordinator
otherNightReminder: Give a finger signal.
ability: Each night*, learn the amount of evil players who voted on today's execution.

name: Football
otherNightReminder: Swap the Demon and another player's tokens. Mark the previous Demon with **BEEN THE DEMON** and inform the players of the character change.
ability: Each night*, the Demon & a player who has not been the Demon, evil if possible, swap characters.

name: Wandering
ability: Each night*, learn if you were mad as an in-play character today, unless you have been mad as the Wandering.

name: Looking Glass
ability: Each night*, learn the alignment of a player you were mad is evil today, unless you have been mad you were the Looking Glass.

name: Landlord
otherNightReminder: The Landlord chooses a player. If a chosen player dies later tonight, wake a living Outsider and show the **YOU ARE** info token & a Townsfolk character token.
ability: Each night, choose another player: if a chosen player dies at night, a living Outsider becomes a Townsfolk. [+0 or +1 Outsider]

name: Somnologist
otherNightReminder: If the Somnologist died tonight, make their statement today from true, if they have one.
ability: Each day, you may tell the Storyteller a statement about the game. If they agree & you die tonight, it becomes true.

name: Hatsmith
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose a player and a Minion character: if not a Demon and not in-play, they become it.

jinxes.reason: Minions created by a Hatsmith do not wake to decide Lil Monsta's babysitter.
If the Hatter ability activates, Minions created by a Hatsmith do not wake with other Minions & Demons.
Minions created by a Hatsmith do not wake with other Minions & Demons for the Poppygrower ability.

name: Artificer
ability: Once per game, privately tell the Storyteller a modification to a Minion & Demon ability each, if they agree.

name: Highlander
ability: When you are executed, if another Highlander & a Minion live, you survive & a Minion dies tonight. [+0 to +2 Highlanders]

name: Big Good Hero Saviour Man
ability: If the Demon kills you, the Demon's ability becomes "Each night*, a player might die."

name: Census Taker
ability: If you guess (once) that today is the 1st day no Outsiders live, learn the Demon, but if wrong get false info. [-1 to +1 Outsiders]

name: Mercenary
firstNightReminder: Take a player selection from the demon
otherNightReminder: If the Mercenary died in the night, show the player.
ability: The Demon starts knowing a good player. If they die, good wins. If you die at night, learn them.

jinxes.reason: The Summoner knows a good player instead of the Demon. They cannot choose that player for their ability. When a Demon is created, they learn the player.
If the good Snake Charmer becomes a Demon, they learn a player for the Mercenary ability that night, replacing the previous player.
The Mercenary's target cannot die to the Lycanthrope.

flavour: Any mark for a price. Some find the cost too great, but I never find my target so.

name: Paladin
ability: Evil players you nominate are drunk until next dusk, unless they are already drunk or poisoned.

name: Anarchist
ability: A player is drunk, even if dead. Each night, choose a player: they are safe from you. [1 Townsfolk is evil & knows the Demon, -1 Minion]

name: Poppymonger
ability: Your closest Minion neighbour is drunk, even if you died in the night. They learn if they are no longer drunk due to you.

name: Ill Omen
ability: You start knowing good players equal to the base Minion count. If any live as good on the final day, your team loses, even if you are dead.

jinxes.reason: If Legion are in-play, the Ill Omen learns Legion players instead of good players.

name: Gubbin
otherNightReminder: Something happens tonight or today. Inform the Gubbin what happened yesterday.
ability: Each night, something happens today. Each night*, learn what yesterday's was.

name: Heartbreaker
ability: Each night, choose a new player: chosen good players might be executed if any are "mad" they agree with you.

name: Neophyte
ability: Your Townsfolk neighbours yield reversed info to themselves, even if you are dead. [A Townsfolk's ability is making you drunk]

name: Recombobulator
otherNightReminder: If the Recombobulator died, wake the Demon and show them the **THIS CHARACTER SELECTED YOU** & Recombobulator tokens. If the Demon chose a player, wake them next. Show the **YOU ARE** token & their new character token.
ability: Each night, even if you died, the Demon may choose a player: they become a different character of their type.

jinxes.reason: If the Demon chooses the Drunk player, the Townsfolk they think they are changes.
Legion cannot choose Legion players.
If a player would become the Village Idiot due to the Recombobulator, the drunk Village Idiot might change.
If the Recombobulator would cause a Demon to become Lil Monsta, they instead become a Minion babysitting Lil Monsta tonight.

old_jinxes.reason: If the Drunk would change characters due to the Recombobulator, instead the character they think they are changes.

The Lunatic receives a fake Recombobulator choice, and the Demon learns their choice. If the Lunatic would change characters due to the Recombobulator, instead the character they think they are changes.
If the Marionette would change characters due to the Recombobulator, instead the character they think they are changes and does not learn 3 not in-play characters.

If there is no Demon, the Summoner chooses whether to use the Recombobulator's ability. If the Recombobulator would cause a Summoner to leave play before that Summoner uses their ability, the Summoner uses their ability immediately. The Summoner cannot create an in-play Demon. If the Summoner creates a not-in-play Demon, deaths tonight are arbitrary.

If the Recombobulator is used and Legion is in play, Legion's characters do not change. If the Recombobulator dies and a player becomes Legion, most players (including all evil players) then become evil Legion.
If the Recombobulator is used and Riot is in play, a normal evil team is created from the Riot players. If the Recombobulator dies and the Demon becomes Riot, Minions become Riot too.
If a player would become the Village Idiot due to the Recombobulator, the drunk Village Idiot might change.
If the Recombobulator would cause a Demon to become Lil Monsta, they instead become a Minion babysitting Lil Monsta tonight.

name: Torpor
ability: If you are good, good can't win & the Demon acts while dead. Each day, you may publicly give this ability to a player, even if drunk, poisoned or dead.

name: King of Storms
ability: When a player dies, their good neighbour might die & so forth.

name: Tailor
otherNightReminder: If an evil player changed character from the Tailor today, show them the **YOU ARE** token, then their new character token.
ability: The first time an evil player would die by execution, they live & become a new character of their type, even if you are dead.

name: Necrophysicist
ability: The first time an evil player or you would die by execution, they live & register as dead, or if you, your team loses.

name: Birefringent
ability: All sober & healthy Townsfolk info is either true or false.

jinxes.reason: If the Census Taker guesses wrong, their information is unaffected by the Birefringent.

name: Paranoiac
firstNightReminder: If all other players are evil, wake all players except the Paranoiac, show them the **YOU ARE** info token and a thumbs down. Then show them the **THIS PLAYER IS** & Paranoiac tokens, then point at the Paranoiac.
ability: All other players might be evil & know you. If you guess they do, your team wins if right & loses if wrong. You can always do this.

jinxes.reason: If all other players are evil and the Fang Gu causes the Paranoiac to become a Fang Gu, they secretly remain good.

flavour: In case I don't see ya, good afternoon, good evening, and good night.

name: Dissovant
firstNightReminder: Show the Dissovant their two good neighbours and prompt them to choose one of them. The Dissovant may indicate they wish to poison the other. Wake the chosen player and inform them they are evil, and place the Dissident reminder on the other. If the Dissovant chose to poison the Dissident, place the Poisoned reminder on them and the No Ability reminder on the Dissovant.
otherNightReminder: The Dissovant may indicate they wish to poison the Dissident. If they do, place the Poisoned reminder on the Dissident until dusk and the No Ability reminder on the Dissovant.
ability: You start knowing your good neighbours and choose 1: they are poisoned, even if you die. If you are executed, they become evil.

name: Sentry
firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all in-play Outsiders.
otherNightReminder: The Sentry might choose a player & not in-play Outsider character. Wake the player and show them the **YOU ARE** info token & their new character token.
ability: You know the in-play Outsiders. Once per game, at night, choose a player and a not in-play Outsider they become. [-1 to +1 Outsiders]

jinxes.reason: The Sentry cannot start knowing the Heretic, and cannot create one.
If a Sentry creates a Damsel, the Storyteller chooses which player it is.
If the Sentry turns an evil player into the Politician, they can't turn good due to their own ability.

name: Biblioclast
firstNightReminder: For each Outsider that is not in-play, prompt the Biblioclast to choose a character. Mark each chosen character with **FALSE**
ability: You start choosing adjacent characters for each not in-play Outsider. Chosen abilities yield false info. [-1 to +1 Outsiders]

name: Graverobber
firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Graverobber needs. If the Graverobber chooses a player, mark the player as **BODYSNATCHED**.
otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as the Graverobber needs. If the Graverobber chooses a player, mark the player as **BODYSNATCHED**.
ability: Each night, you see the Grimoire & may choose a player: while they are dead, you have their ability until you next choose.

name: Insider
ability: Each night, choose a good player: tomorrow, your vote secretly doesn't count if they didn't vote. [+1 Insider that neighbours you]

jinxes.reason: If multiple Insiders change character due to the Recombobulator, all but one become poisoned.
If the Kazali chooses to create a Insider, they choose an additional player to also become an evil Insider.
If there is an active Poppygrower ability, the Insider may choose any other player.
The Magician registers as evil to the Insider.

name: The Mechanism
firstNightReminder: Mark each player 1 step clockwise of each evil player as **POISONED**. Rotate it if it is on an evil player.
otherNightReminder: Move each **POISONED** reminder 1 step clockwise. Rotate it if it is on an evil player.
ability: Each night, a player 1 further clockwise of each evil is poisoned, if Townsfolk, until dusk. After day 4, evil wins.

name: The Queens
otherNightReminder: Each The Queens points to a player. Mark one of the players chosen, or a Demon, with the Dead reminder token.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: 1 player chosen by Demons, or a Demon, dies. [-1 Minion, +1 The Queens]

jinxes.reason: If the Summoner chooses to create The Queens, they must also choose an evil Minion to become The Queens.
The Queens also register as a Minion to the Clockmaker.
If multiple The Queens would change character due to the Recombobulator, only one becomes a Demon and the rest become Minions.
If the Engineer makes The Queens, a Minion also becomes The Queens. If the Engineer causes The Queens to become a Demon, 1 becomes a Demon and another becomes a Minion.

name: Vaudevillian
firstNightReminder: Place the 'is the Marionette' reminder tokens on each good player next to the Demon. Wake the Demon and show them both Marionettes.
otherNightReminder: The Vaudevillian points to a player. That player dies. Any abilities that would fail to work tonight, might work anyway.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Abilities players think they have might work. [+1 Minion, 2 are Marionettes]

name: Necronaut
firstNightReminder: Mark a good player with the 'Phylactery' reminder. Wake the Necronaut and show them the player, then show them the Minion token they have.
otherNightReminder: The Necronaut points to a player. If they killed a Minion, decide which Minion ability the Phylactery gained and show them the token.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. A good player (you know who) has a Minion ability you wake for. Killed Minions grant another.

jinxes.reason: If the Necronaut's good player has the Scarlet Woman ability & it would cause them to become the Demon, a living Minion does instead.

name: Krown
otherNightReminder: At dusk, if no player is Krown & a player has signalled, wake the first player to have signalled. Show them they are the evil Krown, then put them to sleep. At night, wake the Krown and ask them to choose a player. If the Storyteller is Krown, choose a player. Mark that player as dead.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. 1st player to signal at dusk* takes the evil Krown (Minions know). [The Storyteller is Krown]

name: Sclera
firstNightReminder: Show the **THIS PLAYER IS** info token and indicate the Outsider category on script, then point at each Outsider player.
otherNightReminder: The Sclera chooses a player. If the player is an Outsider, prompt them to choose another player. Repeat this until they do not choose an Outsider.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die & if they are an Outsider, keep choosing. You know all Outsiders. [+1 Outsider]

name: Byguyle
otherNightReminder: The Byguyle chooses a player. If a player is marked as **NOMINATOR**, kill a different player of that player's character type.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you were nominated today, another player of your nominator's type dies. [Even Townsfolk]

name: Tegumenta
otherNightReminder: The Tegumenta points to as many players as they would like. The 1st player dies. If all the other players are the same character as the 1st, all the other players die too.
ability: Each night*, choose any players: the 1st dies & if all others are the 1st's character, they die. [Some characters are duplicates, +? Outsiders]

name: Parasite
ability: Each day, choose a player: you move to share their seat & if you are good give true info or if evil poison them (if good).
